Author: enchang54
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Project is really great and has potential but it is not attracting a lot of investors,  I suggest your marketing team should do some facebook paid ads with an informative video about the company, and hire a crypto marketing agency to do your marketing work. There are a lot of marketing agencies handling ICO's and they are successful promoting it. I observe also that some of your ads focuses mainly on other companies failed projects which is not helping your company at all by comparing it..  You have to focus mainly on your company's goals and objective and how it is going to be beneficial for investors to join.  Be precise and professional when it comes to your video ads. Do not use humor or figurative language to promote the company. Thats is my suggestion. I am doing your bounty program by the way, and I noticed a lot of things, I hope you will take this advise into consideration. I wish the company goodluck.

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ!  Hi, All!  We were on a small vacation right before ending of our ICO and we were unable to actively post on social networks and answer emails. Please, take our apologies.  However, as you can see, the cryptomarket is still in a bad shape and cryptoinvestments are stalled. Thus we decided to schedule a restart of our ICO for autumn 2018 if the cryptomarket gets well. If all is OK, we will do as expected: continue ICO and pay the bounty rewards. For now, please stop posting links to our bounty system.  If you do not want to wait, for those who invested in cryptos in our ICO we offer a full refund. Please send us a small message from the same email you used to register, your payment will be sent back within 2 days. We will deal with our offline investments accordingly.  Sincerely, RCI Team

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Attention, please! Important announcement from August 30, 2018.  Dear Investors!  We have been working hard through the summer and finally we have some great news: despite continuous crypto-market falling, we have secured $4M for our project from offline investors and currently we are building a new hotel. Some photos from the construction site will be posted a bit later on our FB/TW.  Also we have reconsidered our bounty program. Bad news: unfortunately, there were no online investors who came via bounty program and stayed until this very moment, so there is no reason to keep it running. Additionally, our links are now blacklisted by FB/TW, thanks to spammers. Good news: we are going to keep the Referral program and also pay 10% reward in ETH! Thus, the RCI Tokens are used for investors only.  With best regards, the RCI Team

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Yes, this was left unchanged. However, while we were securing current $4M investment, we agreed to invest into certain property, chosen by the investor.   Quote from: kemancok on September 10, 2018, 11:29:08 AM Is there no update on this project, where can I read it? I am curious about the progress of your project, hope the team or dev can answer my question well, thanks.  The update is actually 3 posts earlier. TL, DR: referral bounty rewards in ETH, secured money from an offline investor.

Author: bandibar
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Good afternoon, I found a bug in your website(in header), the timer is working properly, but the % and the collected values are displayed as a fixed version of the text. And now for 5 days (which I observed) it does not change. This can alienate buyers, as they think that the project has no development or investment. Could you update this data?

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: We update the counter as we get more investment. The amount of gathered funds are downloaded dynamically, it's not a static HTML that we upload every time.  At the same time, your observations are correct: during the last week we did not get any new funds. However, if you take a look to the cryptomarket, you will see a 3x price fall during the last 4 month. This does not help to secure more funds. We got almost all of them offline and in fiat.  So, we will be happy to update the data as soon as someone else decides to join our ICO.

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Simultaneously with today's rapid crypto-market growth we have secured $50,000.

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: WEBSITE | BOUNTY | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | VK   UPDATED August 30, 2018  Main purpose of the ICO is to gather funds for further investment into well-known and understandable realty market. The RCI token will be supported by commercial property with known or projected profitability that allows not only to keep current token's price but raise it by distributing dividends.  Technical data: Total amount of tokens: 100,000,000 (one hundred million) Price per 1 (one) token: $0.50 USD (zero point fifty cents of the US dollar) Minimum contribution: 100 USD (one hundred US dollar) Token convenient name: RCI Technology: ERC-20 Standard-based token Ethereum contract address: 0xc0Bd05407FBE1fb6461ce6f33e487A573551b927 Monitoring: https://etherscan.io/address/0xc0bd05407fbe1fb6461ce6f33e487a573551b927 Start date: September 1, 2018 End date: January 31, 2019 (may be extended to reach the closest cap) Hard cap: $45,000,000 USD (90,000,000 RCI sold) Soft caps: $5,000,000 USD / 25,000,000 USD (10,000,000 RCI / 50,000,000 RCI sold correspondingly) Currencies accepted: ETH, BTC, XRP, BCH, LTC + QIWI, Yandex.Money, Webmoney + Cash, Western Union (more to be added soon)  Token distribution policy key principles Realty Crypto Investment Company distributes all of the RCI tokens (100%) to investors There are no pre-sale, after-sale and any other kinds of discounts 100% of RCI tokens are to be sold during the ICO Any unused tokens are denied for further distribution after the RCI ICO has finished  We are not blockchain experts, but realty market ones, focusing on commercial and accommodation realty. Please don't be afraid of our small team: there are a lot of realty professionals who do not understand ICOs and cryptos so it is very hard to convince them to join or partner. Currently we are expecting an agreement with our offline friends from large Spain network and will update website info accordingly.  TL,DR: We are going to use secured cryptos to buy/build accomodation in famous tourist areas and distribute profits among token investors.   BOUNTY campaign shortly: 10% in ETH for any purchased amount by a person you have invited (NOT in tokens!). Bounty faq is here: https://www.rcicompany.com/en/bounty/ Bounty: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3083383.msg31804782#msg31804782   WEBSITE | BOUNTY | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | VK

Author: penoze
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: See here a project what is investing is realty markets and sharing profits if I understood well, what my question is what can I understand with realty markets? Can you give a little explanation about it?

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Yes, you understood well with the project, but what you want to understand with realty markets? How to make $? 1. Developer way: you buy land, build a house, add your % and sell it as a whole or by apartments. Relatively quick, good %, but you need a ton of money on start. 2. Realty manager way: you buy property from developer/owner and establish/continue your business, usually rental/accommodation. Initial money depends on certain property, may take years to make returns equal to 3. expenses, but then you are in a permanent surplus getting your %. 3. Realtor way: you help developers buy land and sell house/apartments, get your %. Quickest, but income is relatively small while almost no expenses.  We are going to use way 1 or 2, depending on our ICO results.

Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: After ICO we will become "the clients" and there is no problem with KYC.  Currenty we are focusing on tourist regions of Spain (known, stable) and Georgia (cheap, good ROI).

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: All purchases will be made from our main company of its local subsidiaries where it is required by law. We will publish bank statements so you will see every cent spent and gathered. Good question btw, added it to the FAQ.

Body: Okay that seems to be interesting although Georgia is not an well known vacation country but the future can change of course. Watched some pics about Georgia and it looks very beautiful there, did you some research to numbers of tourist what is going to Georgia?

Author: rci
Title: [ICO] Realty Crypto Investment
Body: Sure. Average montly tourist count in Georgia is between 500k and 1M depending on the season, summer is more popular obviously. Our main target there is the Batumi city, which is in Top-10 best European cities for tourists (National Geographic Traveler).
